Title: Multipart to singleparts
Abstract: This algorithm takes a vector layer with multipart geometries and generates a new one in which all geometries contain a single part. Features with multipart geometries are divided in as many different features as parts the geometry contain, and the same attributes are used for each of them.

Accepted data types.str: 'memory:' to store result in temporary memory layer
using vector provider ID prefix and destination URI, e.g. 'postgres:…' to store result in PostGIS table
